jobs.title: Senior Python Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Senior Python Developer to join our backend team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with Python, microservices architecture, and cloud platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain Python-based microservices
- Design and implement RESTful APIs using FastAPI or Django
- Work with PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases
- Deploy and manage applications on AWS
- Collaborate with frontend developers and product managers
- Write clean, tested, and documented code

Requirements:
- 5+ years of Python development experience
- Strong knowledge of FastAPI, Django, or Flask
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
- Proficiency with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS)
- Knowledge of SQL and database design
- Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines

Nice to Have:
- Experience with machine learning libraries
- Knowledge of message brokers (Redis, RabbitMQ)
- Understanding of system design principles

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Join our data science team to build predictive models and derive insights from large datasets. We're looking for someone passionate about machine learning and data analysis.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and deploy machine learning models
- Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
- Create data visualizations and reports
- Collaborate with engineering teams to productionize models
- Clean and preprocess large datasets
- Communicate findings to stakeholders

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in data science
- Proficiency in Python and data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn)
- Experience with SQL and database querying
- Knowledge of statistical methods and ML algorithms
- Experience with data visualization tools
- Strong problem-solving skills

Nice to Have:
- Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
- Knowledge of big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)

jobs.title: React Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
We're seeking a skilled React Developer to build modern, responsive web applications. You'll work closely with our design team to create exceptional user experiences.

Responsibilities:
- Develop new user-facing features using React
- Build reusable components and frontend libraries
- Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code
- Optimize components for maximum performance
- Collaborate with backend developers on API integration
- Write unit and integration tests

Requirements:
- 3+ years of React development experience
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including ES6+ features
- Experience with popular React workflows (Redux, Context API)
- Familiarity with modern frontend build pipelines and tools
- Knowledge of RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling
- Experience with CSS preprocessors and CSS-in-JS

Nice to Have:
- Experience with TypeScript
- Knowledge of testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
- Experience with server-side rendering (Next.js)
- Understanding of web accessibility standards
